title: Poll: Who will win Wimbledon 2025?
description: Wimbledon is just a few days away, set to begin Monday. Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz, No. 1 in PIF ATP Rankings Jannik Sinner, seven-time champion Novak Djokovic and plenty of other stars will headline action at the grass-court major. Who do you think will be the champion this year? Make your choice below in atptour.com's Wimbledon poll. [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Carlos Alcaraz, Jannik Sinner, Novak Djokovic or someone else? Who is your pick to win Wimbledon 2025? Make your choice in atptour.com's poll.

Poll: Who will win Wimbledon 2025?

Make your pick for this year's winner

June 26, 2025

Mike Hewitt/Getty Images

Wimbledon runs from 30 June-13 July. By ATP Staff

Wimbledon is just a few days away, set to begin Monday.

Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz, No. 1 in PIF ATP Rankings Jannik Sinner, seven-time champion Novak Djokovic and plenty of other stars will headline action at the grass-court major.

Who do you think will be the champion this year?

Make your choice below in atptour.com's Wimbledon poll.
